messages.message: I know this is not the best use of my time, but it has been long time since I coded -- so I started designing the layout of what we'll call Instabase Universe -- the whole idea of Instabase Universe is a single place to manage everything within an organization -- [1] Search: you should  find any info (about any person, the company info, team info, company weekly, team weekly, company diary, individual diary, company strategy, on-boarding, org structure, product info,  whatever you can think of), and [2] Organize/Manage Information (for examples: company weekly, team weekly, individuals weekly, 1:1s, profiles of people, team, groups, blogs, your own curated lists, etc.)- this should become a gateway for everything within an org. Since I didn't have any data -- I just plugged in Google Maps apis to find bars, nightlife, restaurants, etc. but the whole idea is we should be able to find any info here. More details to follow.
